translation.START_SCREEN_TEXT: Match with people who think like you!
translation.NUMBER_SCREEN_DESC: Corny will send you a one-time password via SMS to verify your number
translation.PHONE_MAX_LENGTH: Your phone number cannot be more than 10 characters!
translation.PHONE_MIN_LENGTH: Your phone number cannot be less than 10 characters!
translation.OTP_SCREEN_DESC: Corny will send you a one-time password via SMS to verify your number
translation.UNABLE_TO_CONNECT_DESC: To use Corny, you need to enable location sharing so we can show you who's around.
translation.NAVIGATION_SCREEN_TITLE: The perfect match may be just next to you.
translation.NAVIGATION_SCREEN_DESC: Give access to your location information to get location-based recommendations
translation.NAME_SCREEN_DESC: It will be displayed in your profile. If you need you can change it in your profile.
translation.PHOTO_SCREEN_TITLE: Include up to 6 images in your profile
translation.PHOTO_SCREEN_DESC: A profile with 2 or more photos is more likely to get Likes!
translation.MOVIE_SCREEN_TITLE: What are your favorite tv series and movies your name?
translation.MOVIE_SCREEN_DESC: Choose your favorite tv series and movies for more personalized recomendations!
